title: Need Help with Quest TeamFight Tactics
body:
Play,
  Quest is:  Activate a 6 Piece Set Bonus


What am I supposed to be doing here?  I have added 6 pieces of armor to a hero so they have their max 3 full pieces.  Didn't work.  No idea what to do at this point.  Thanks!!

replies.body: I have been told in game that it  is a heroe set.  so Like 6 Knights.  :)
Yeah just confirmed it, 6 nobles did the trick.
I just did 6 yordles and it didn't complete it for me D:

> [{quoted}](name=Cherry Bot,realm=NA,application-id=okOuNvuT,discussion-id=2HuWfArV,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2019-07-03T02:52:15.171+0000)
>
> I just did 6 yordles and it didn't complete it for me D:

Also keep in mind that the Weekly Missions normally process after the entire match is over. So if you completed a 6 Yordle Team, but were eliminated soon after; you won't see progress until the Rank 1 and Rank 2 players have been determined and the match fully concludes.
Just got 7 demons and didnt get it :( doesnt that mean it has to be 6?
I did yordles as well and didn't get it straight away. It just takes some time and maybe a log out and in
just did that myself and it didnt do the trick.
thank you. works with noble. ğŸ™ğŸ»ğŸ™ğŸ»
Guys, I did 6 glacial and it worked.

I got it with Yordles, and I got it straight away. 
But I was in seccond place, so I didnt had to wait.
What a crappy quest this is. Should be able to reroll shit like this...
